alert.note: Alert for Allegheny (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 17 at 5:28AM EST until February 19 at 10:36PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Pennsylvania... Allegheny River At CW Bill Young Dam affecting Allegheny County.
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at weather.gov/pbz. PAZ021-171830- /O.EXT.KPBZ.FL.A.0004.220219T0936Z-220220T0336Z/ /ACMP1.0.ER.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.NO/ 528 AM EST Thu Feb 17 2022 ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT TO LATE SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Allegheny River at CW Bill Young Dam. * WHEN...From late Friday night to late Saturday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 AM EST Thursday the stage was 11.7 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
